Docs.summary: Represents an immutable block of binary data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When`null` is passed to this constructor instead of the required array of bytes, a <xref:System.ArgumentNullException?displayProperty=fullName> exception is thrown. Do not rely on this behavior because it may change in the future.
